steps.text:
Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 26-2010. A 54-year-old 
man with loss of vision and a rash.
Pless ML(1), Kroshinsky D, LaRocque RC, Buchbinder BR, Duncan LM.

Author information:
(1)Department of Neurology, Massachusetts General Hospital, and Harvard Medical 
School, Boston, USA.
